thread.title: Daren Kemp to Join Korn Ferry as Senior Client Partner

author: cnbc.com
title: Daren Kemp to Join Korn Ferry as Senior Client Partner
text:
LOS ANGELES--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Korn Ferry (NYSE:KFY) today announced that Daren Kemp will join the firm as a senior client partner and senior member of the Board and CEO practice. He will be based in the firm’s Singapore office.
Mr. Kemp brings more than 20 years' experience in global executive search. He joins Korn Ferry from a multinational search firm where he managed senior leadership appointments in the industrial and financial services sectors. While there, he was also a member of the CEO & Board practice, the global head of the Industrial practice, chairman of the firm's client service program, and held various geographic head roles.
“Daren is a venerable industry leader with a breadth of global experience working across various market sectors,” said Michael Distefano, Chief Operating Officer, Korn Ferry, Asia Pacific. “His vast experience in leadership and advisor roles and deep expertise working with board and chief executives is a welcome addition to our clients and firm; we are delighted to welcome him back to Asia Pacific.”
Previously, Mr. Kemp was managing director and CEO of Akamai Financial Markets and a director at search firm Executive Access Asia in both Hong Kong and Japan.
Mr. Kemp began his career working within the financial services industry, where he lived and worked in the key financial markets of Japan, Hong Kong, London and New York over a twelve-year period.
Mr. Kemp studied at Bishop's Stortford College in Hertfordshire, UK, before acquiring his FSA licenses in London, New York, and Hong Kong.
About Korn Ferry
Korn Ferry is a global organizational consulting firm. We help companies design their organization – the structure, the roles and responsibilities, as well as how they compensate, develop and motivate their people. As importantly, we help organizations select and hire the talent they need to execute their strategy. Our approximately 7,000 colleagues serve clients in more than 50 countries.
